title.narrative: Burkina Faso Higher Education Support Project

description.narrative: The development objective of the Project is to strengthen higher education institutions to increase access and deliver quality education in priority subject areas.

condition.narrative: No later than November 30 of each calendar year during Project implementation, the Recipient shall furnish to the Association acomplete Independent Verification Agent Report including all the findings as well as the certifications from the IndependentVerification Agent of the degree of achievement of the Disbursement Linked Results.

No later than six months from the Effective Date, and prior to the submittal of a withdrawal request as set forth in Section IVbelow, the Recipient, through MESRSI, shall engage, under terms of reference and with qualifications satisfactory to theAssociation, an Independent Verification Agent, for purposes of preparing and delivering Independent Verification Agent Reports inrespect of DLIs 1 through 6 set forth in Section III of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement (FA).
The Recipient shall furnish to the Association each Project Report not later than one month after the end of each calendarsemester, covering the calendar semester.

The Recipient shall furnish to the Association, as soon as available, but in any case not later than November 30 of each year(except for the annual work plan and budget for the Project for the first year of Project implementation which shall be furnishedno later than one (1) month after the Effective Date), the annual work plans and budgets, for their review and approval. Only theactivities included in an annual work plan and budget expressly approved by the Association (each an “Annual Work Plan and Budget”)are eligible to a financing from the proceeds of the Financing.

The Recipient shall recruit, not later than five (5) months after the Effective Date, an external auditor for the Project, withqualifications, experience, and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association.

The Recipient shall recruit, not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, an internal auditor for the Project, withqualifications, experience, and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association.
